entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SpawnBrowserAsync #107771
    10.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessWaitingTests.MultipleProcesses_ParallelStartKillWait timeout #107765
  • [9.0] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.ConcurrentBidirectionalReadsWrites_Success is hanging #107762
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic tests timeout #107761
  • Using a default method on an interface to implement a static virtual interface method leads to memory corruption #107754
  • [browser] JSSynchronizationContext.Pump: Unexpected failure (ManagedThreadId #107752
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Flowgraph Modernization and Improved Block Layout in .NET 10 #107749
    10.0.0
  • .NET 9 RC 1 publish failed for WebAssembly AOT #107745
    10.0.0
  • [Wasm] Satellite assemblies for localization are not used #107742
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] unify Interop.GetHostName #107741
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix swift struct lowering support for `InlineArray` #107736
    10.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket ignoring custom SPN/UPN for Kerberos authentication #107733
    Future
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws not expected ArgumentOutOfRangeException #107729
  • Error: [MONO] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/assembly.c:1673, condition `<disabled>' not met #107730
    8.0.x
  • Possible regression with [ThreadStatic] in debug builds on .NET 9 RC1 #107728
  • Test failure: JIT/Stress/ABI/tailcalls_do/tailcalls_do.cmd #107727
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Native AOT Binaries still depend on libz.so #106566
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests fails with assertion in mini-ppc.c on ppc64le #97296
    Future
  • Failing test cases System.IO.FileSystem #107636
    10.0.0
  • Document to explain what each FEATURE_XXXX is #7347
  • Quick Start Guide for New Contributors Guide #31146
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed '!fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree)' during 'Morph - Global' #107544
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.CacheTests.JsonSerializerOptionsUpdateHandler_ClearingDoesntPreventSerialization #107589
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm] Support for the mono log profiler for memory profiling #107312
    9.0.0
  • Exception thrown in GC callback while walking native object wrappers on AOT #104582
    10.0.0
  • Remove unused predicate versions of instructions from API comments #107738
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize(ROS<byte>, JsonTypeInfo<T>>) hangs with AllowOutOfOrderMetadataProperties on Amazon Linux 2023 with native AoT #107740
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tailcall/mutual_recursion/mutual_recursion.cmd #106601
  • Make all compiled strings default utf8 #107720
  • Unnecessary outer loop in CountBy #106110
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryGetReadOnlySpan<T>() to CollectionsMarshal for ReadOnlyCollection<T> #106066
    Future
  • Potential (~5% chance) AccessViolationException in ReadyToRun executable targeting RID osx.11.0-arm64/osx.12-arm64 when running a child process for the first time, and both standard output and standard error are redirected #88288
  • Application crashes in release mode throwing System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #100758
  • NTLM authentication not working in Linux based environment #101058
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 9.0 RC1] Inline Array's cannot be deserialized by System.Text.Json #107715

PullRequests

Created

  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Move UseSystemZlib into SetupOSSpecificProps #107770
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 9.0.0
  • Restructure JSImport/JSExport generators to share more code and utilize more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration shared code #107769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Make `AppDomain::AssemblyIterator` iterate over `Assembly` instead of `DomainAssembly` #107768
    needs-area-label
  • Remove `DebuggerModule::Get/SetPrimaryModule` - always itself #107767
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM64] Generate frames compatible with Apple compact unwinding #107766
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-CodeGen-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • Fix memory corruption bug in virtual static method dispatch #107763
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107760
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue a deprecation warning for COMPlus_ prefix #107759
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove entries of SVE APIs take 32-bit address #107758
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Profiler] Update GetFunctionInfo2 to have a decent default ClassID #107753
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0][browser] Enable the log profiler #107747
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fixed swift lowering support for inline arrays #107744
    area-VM-meta-mono, area-Interop-mono
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • First-class Span #107737
    needs-area-label
  • [NRBF] Comments and bug fixes from security review #107735
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Add some missing docs in System #107726
    area-Meta

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Bump to 8.0.10, 6.0.35 for downlevel #107702
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [s390x] Use consistent shift instruction #107750
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Move UseSystemZlib into SetupOSSpecificProps #107666
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ppc64le] Fixed BinaryFormatter and Tensors tests #107678
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Backport some PACKAGE.md files #107724
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #107751
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix test bug in FileSystem.Tests #107696
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [JIT/ARM64] Fix few SP-based instruction encoding issues #107732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused predicate instructions from API comments #107739
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/9.0] [DiagnosticSource] Add version event to EventSources used for out-of-proc monitoring #107748
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix heap corruption issue in PriorityQueue.Remove #107603
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] TypeName fuzzer and bug fixes #107533
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/9.0] Backport "Fix SVE ExtendWidening ConditionalSelect tests" (#107601) #107725
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #107633
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Revert "don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono (#106764)" #107675
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107624
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DiagnosticSource] Add version event to EventSources used for out-of-proc monitoring #107576
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable the log profiler #107434
    arch-wasm, community-contribution, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove ILCompiler package reference #107583
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Add missing `[RequiresDynamicCode]` attributes to System.Linq.Expressions API in ref assembly #107638
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Work around F# ildasm/ilasm round-trip test failure #107692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move load level tracking and checks from `DomainAssembly` to `Assembly` #107697
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] JIT ARM64-SVE: Backport "Avoid combining conditional select for reduction instrinsics" (#107207) #107722
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [ILStrip] Fix passing assemblies using relative path #107548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #107398
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] System.Net.NameResolution #107351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] More bug fixes #107682
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf

Updated

  • Doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107773
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add feature switch to disable DataSet XML serialization #107713
    area-System.Data
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Arm: Free up upper-half register that was not ready because of its association with busy lower-half register #107714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107687
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.10
  • [release/9.0] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107685
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107656
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.10
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Process LinkerArg for wasm targets #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • Update to RC1 SDK #107673
    area-Infrastructure
  • GC test cleanup #107000
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #107709
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix swizzle_mask type #107602
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix crash in emit_llvmonly_handler_start #107590
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove some implicit Helper Method Frames (HMF) #107648
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Arrays of any records #107627
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Allow preinitializing spans created from arrays #107575
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • WebSocket Feedback Follow-up #107662
    area-System.Net
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
